lectures.tracktitle: Keynote from Sindhu Gangadharan MD, SAP Labs India ; Head, Customer Innovation Services, SAP and Fireside chat with customers and partners

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business AI: Driving Innovation, Transforming Businesses
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Business AI: Driving Innovation, Transforming Businesses

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Preview on Joule - Unified Setup & Extensibility via SAP Build
sessionsBySequence.description: Discover Unified Joule's robust capabilities and customizable extensions in this session. Learn to integrate, streamline, and enhance operations through core functionalities and real-world applications. We will dive into various extension scenarios, demonstrating how you can expand its capabilities to meet specific needs. Unlock the full potential of this versatile platform to drive innovation and efficiency in your organization.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Reimagining SAP Business AI with SAP Knowledge Graph & Agents
sessionsBySequence.description: Reimagining SAP Business AI with SAP Knowledge Graph & Agents

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle:
Transforming CX with SAP C/4HANA:
Powered by SAP BTP & Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: Join this live demo to learn how SAP BTP, together with the CX AI Toolkit, powers a seamless 360° CX. Learn how BTP Integrations enables the data flows across SAP CDC, CDP, Emarsys, Commerce, CPQ, and Sales & Service Cloud to create a Unified Customer profile and Journey. This session is ideal for those seeking to understand SAP CX and C/4HANA Capabilities and Importance for Enterprises.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Data and Analytics Strategy in the Age of AI
sessionsBySequence.description: This session highlights how SAP leverages AI to transform and simplify Data & Analytics. It focuses on integration of Business AI capabilities into SAP's Data & Analytics portfolio, offering insights into our strategy and roadmap designed to accelerate decision making,  deliver value-driven outcomes and empower businesses to stay ahead in a fast-changing technology world.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP BTP: Reference Architecture for Developing Custom Generative AI Applications and Real-World Customer Use Cases
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session, we will explore the reference architecture for developing custom Generative AI applications on SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP). Attendees will gain insights into how to leverage SAP BTP’s powerful tools and services to build scalable, AI-driven solutions tailored to business needs. The session will also showcase real-world customer use cases, demonstrating the practical applications of Generative AI in various industries.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Get the best of document grounding with GenAI hub and Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: This session is geared towards all personas looking to get started with conversational search and information retrieval scenario via Joule and also achieve RAG scenarios via Document Grounding  in GenAI Hub. We're focused on ensuring you have the basic building blocks to equip you with a smooth start to your RAG journey.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Democratization of Generative AI with SAP Analytics Cloud
sessionsBySequence.description: Using the potential of Generative AI in SAP Analytics Cloud, to automate a broad range of tasks and therefore boost productivity, reduce costs, and offer new growth opportunities.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: AI Breakthroughs Unleashed: From Ideas to Innovation with SAP Business AI
sessionsBySequence.description: AI Breakthroughs Unleashed: From Ideas to Innovation with SAP Business AI

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Boost your Generative AI query with SAP HANA Vector Engine
sessionsBySequence.description:
intelligent data apps, the next
generation of self-learning and self-adapting applications
that leverage built-in analytical and operational database
capabilities to transform and augment user experiences.
Intelligent data apps using SAP HANA database enable an adaptive customer
experience and power intelligent decision-making as they
leverage generative AI capabilities with additional context info from Vector Engine

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Are You on the Right Path to Learn AI with SAP?
sessionsBySequence.description:
Are you excited about learning AI but unsure if you are on the right path? Are you overwhelmed with so many jargons like Gen AI, SAP Business AI, SAP AI Core, Joule, AI Foundation etc.
In this session, we will talk about how to start and align your AI learning journey with SAP innovations.
You will learn:
 - What steps to take first
 - How to choose the best learning resources
 - How to have a clear, structured learning approach, aligned with SAP
 - Tips to stay updated and avoid mistakes
This session is for anyone who wants to learn AI in a smart and simple way. No coding or deep knowledge needed—just bring your curiosity!

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: BTP Translation Hub Features and the enablement
sessionsBySequence.description: The SAP BTP Translation is a Cloud based solution designed to manage translations in SAP Environments efficiently. It leverages machine learning and SAP specific context to provide high quality translations for RICEFW and business documents.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Exploring SAP's latest GenAI Innovations and Technology Trends
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session, we will explore the latest advancements in Generative AI technology and the significant industry trends shaping the future. We will delve into the exciting innovations that SAP has delivered in 2024 and discuss the groundbreaking projects currently in development. Attendees will gain insights and see in action, how SAP's GenAI solutions are transforming various business functions, from finance and supply chain to customer experience and human resources. Join us to discover how SAP is leading the way in leveraging GenAI to drive business value and stay ahead in the rapidly evolving technological landscape.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Joule-Powered Freestyle App Development for SAP UI5
sessionsBySequence.description: This session will explore how Joule, an AI-powered tool, is used to design freestyle SAP UI5 applications. We will explore how Joule integrates with SAP Fiori and UI5, its benefits in reducing development time, and innovative future possibilities like generating apps from hand-drawn UI designs. A demo video will provide a hands-on look at Joule in action, followed by a discussion on how it can transform application development

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business AI Commercial Model
sessionsBySequence.description: The session aims to provide an overview of the "SAP Business AI Commercial Model", covering key aspects such as selling Business AI and the associated incentive programs. Understanding this model is crucial before initiating any SAP Business AI project, as it equips end users to make informed decisions.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Scrap Management and Reel Matching using Machine Learning and Gen AI​
sessionsBySequence.description:
The Solution streamlines the pre-production process for a Cable/Reel/Paper/ manufacturing by implementing a ML and Gen AI solution. This solution will efficiently match available inventory reels to sales orders, propose reel cutting, and generate production orders to minimize material wastage while ensuring timely fulfillment of customer sales orders.​

​
The solution uses AI/ML based mathematical optimiser to propose the best matching reel to fulfil sales order, to minimise wastage from leftovers​

Approval based workflow​

Uses Generative AI to generate communications and order details.​

Integrates with S/4 and HANA cloud along with AI Launchpad, Gen AI Hub and Vector Engine​

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Building an ERP strategy for tomorrow’s world
sessionsBySequence.description: What does the day in the life of your customer and employee look like 5 years from now? How does one tap into the opportunities while tackling the challenges in the business environment? Let us jointly decipher the answers and take a close look at SAP’s vision and the AI-first, Suite-first strategy and the trends that are shaping the future. In this session we will get a glimpse of how Cloud ERP powered by the SAP Business Technology Platform acts as the foundation for shaping your success- today and tomorrow.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Building enterprise grade AI applications on SAP BTP using RAG with HANA vector Engine , Gen AI hub ,SAP Cloud SDK for AI and CAP LLM plugin with anonymization feature
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session we will demystify concepts on RAG with HANA vector engine , understand how to set up Gen AI hub , capabilities of SAP Cloud SDK for AI, CAP LLM plugin and how it helps in anonymizing user data that is passed to LLMs. We will also see a live demo app deployed on SAP BTP on RAG based PDF search.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Empower Your Business with Intelligent Situation Handling
sessionsBySequence.description: Situation Handling in SAP S/4HANA Cloud automatically notifies the responsible users about critical issues that require their attention, such as upcoming deadlines, expiring contracts, and many more. Learn more about the different configuration options, analytics capabilities, and how we're moving towards enhanced intelligence in the situation resolution process.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: 𝗘𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗱𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗔𝗜 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗼 𝗕𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝘆
sessionsBySequence.description:
We need to make generative AI a part of your business strategy, but where do you begin, and how do you make the best possible use of company resources and employees’ time? QWe also need find out how to build clear strategies for AI roadmap development, implementation, and performance evaluation using solutions from SAP like AppHaus, Joule, SAP S4/HANA , SuccessFactors, Predictive analytics and forecasting. In this session I would present the USAGE framework, a comprehensive guide for decision makers to understand, assess, and implement generative AI effectively in their organization.

The session will equip the audience with a systematic framework that provides actionable steps and pragmatic recommendations to ensure AI initiatives are strategic, effective, and aligned with the organization’s vision. Explore the importance of investing in AI literacy to gain competitive advantage. Learn how to create a structured approach for assessing your organization’s AI readiness.

Session Objectives:
SAP's AI offerings and How to work with Embedded AI across solutions.
Differentiate between the stages of the USAGE framework used for AI adoption.
Explain the importance of AI literacy for a competitive advantage.
Describe what a feasibility assessment provides.
Determine the steps of structuring AI leadership and ownership.
Articulate the six pillars that form the foundation of responsible AI deployment.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business AI with SAP Build
sessionsBySequence.description: Learn how you can infuse AI into extensions and how you can leverage AI capabilities of SAP Build

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Build an Application with SAP Build Code and Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: Build an Application with SAP Build Code and Joule

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Datasphere: Recent Innovations, road map, and strategy
sessionsBySequence.description: This session highlights the SAP Datasphere solution, its latest enhancements, and the strategic direction, including features planned for the next 12 months.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Natural Language Processing and Conversational AI in SAP
sessionsBySequence.description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Conversational AI in SAP focuses on integrating advanced AI technologies to improve user experience, efficiency, and workflow automation within SAP systems. It explores how SAP leverages NLP and Conversational AI to enable natural language interactions, such as chatbots and voice commands, enhancing the way users engage with enterprise applications for more intuitive and intelligent experiences. It also focuses on how NLP and Conversational AI are integrated into BTP to enhance enterprise workflows, from finance and HR to supply chain and customer service.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Revolutionize ABAP Development with Joule, our generative AI co-pilot
sessionsBySequence.description: Developer capabilities in the ABAP programming language in the Joule copilot can boost productivity and simplify the extension of SAP applications. Explore real-world use cases, upcoming releases, and ways Joule capabilities – such as completing and explaining code, and creating unit tests – can transform your development process. See how Joule can enhance everyday work and support clean core implementations.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: AI ethics and Orchestration Services
sessionsBySequence.description: AI ethics and Orchestration Services

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Unlocking the Power of AI in Cloud-based Applications : Integrating the capabilities of Robotic Process Automation
sessionsBySequence.description:
1) Overview of Intelligent RPA.
2) Integrating SAP AI with other Cloud- based Applications.
3) Automating repetitive tasks within your organization using RPA.
4) Security considerations in SAP RPA .
5) Future Trends and Use-cases in SAP AI and RPA .
sessionsBySequence.organization1: Speaker 1 : Visa Inc , Speaker 2 : Schneider Electric

lectures.tracktitle: Special celebratory evening - with a live band performance

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Deloitte POD
sessionsBySequence.description: Deloitte POD

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Mindset Consulting
sessionsBySequence.description: Mindset Consulting

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Know SAP Better
sessionsBySequence.description: Know SAP Better

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Experience the Effortless Interview Evaluation Powered by Joule
sessionsBySequence.description: This session will introduce Joule—an AI-powered copilot designed to enhance the entire recruitment process. Unlike traditional methods that require switching between multiple platforms, Joule offers a seamless, all-in-one solution to assess candidates. By automating key aspects of recruitment, Joule significantly saves time, streamlining interview evaluations and the overall hiring process, ultimately improving efficiency and quality for recruiters.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP and AWS Joint Reference Architectures
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP and AWS have joined forces and have come up with a set of Reference Architectures to tackle practical business scenarios using various SAP BTP and AWS services. These Joint Reference Architectures (JRA) built by SAP & AWS will be the foundation for building new applications, extensions, analytical dashboards, or machine learning models for our customers. SAP & AWS are committed to updating and improving the architecture with new services and features released by SAP and AWS in the future.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Build for LoBs
sessionsBySequence.description: Discover real life use cases of SAP Build across LoBs

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: BW Modernization and Semantic Onboarding options in SAP Datasphere
sessionsBySequence.description: This session provides an overview of the different SAP BW modernization approaches and migration paths for Legacy SAP Business Warehouse Customers to SAP Datasphere - the strategic target solution for all data warehouse and data management use cases in the public cloud, and how customers can leverage and protect their existing on premise investments.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Business AI: Joule in SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud
sessionsBySequence.description: Provide an overview of Business AI innovations in SAP S/4HANA Private cloud through Joule. Learn about Joule capabilities available in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: AI Joule integration in Controlling
sessionsBySequence.description:
Complete Cost center and internal order management via joule 

The Manage Internal Order capability enables the Finance Controller to view details and manage internal orders across respective apps.
You can ask Joule to provide detailed information, such as statuses or items from internal orders, without needing to locate and open the relevant apps. For instance, Joule can display all internal orders for a particular user or indicate where an internal order is used within Finance Controlling overall.

The Manage Cost Center capability enables Finance Controller to view the details and Manage the Cost Center to the respective apps.
You can ask Joule to show you detailed information from Cost Center, without the need to find and open the relevant apps. Joule is able to show you, for example, all Cost Center for a particular user or where exactly the Cost Center used overall in Finance Controlling overall.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Leverage SAP's Business AI Feature Catalog to Transform Your Business
sessionsBySequence.description: Explore the powerful features of SAP Business AI and discover how embedded AI capabilities can drive real-world results for your business. Learn about the benefits, pricing, and resources available through SAP Discovery Center, along with reference architecture and real customer use cases. Understand how SAP’s Business Technology Platform (BTP) services can support your AI journey, providing tailored solutions and expert guidance to help you achieve your business goals.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Modernize, Integrate, and Innovate with API-centric and Event-driven Integration
sessionsBySequence.description: Integrate mission-critical applications and systems to accelerate innovation across the extended enterprise. Learn about how SAP Integration Suite is evolving to provide the best of the breed features to meet the enterprise integration needs of organizations.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP SuccessFactors Onboarding experience with Joule
sessionsBySequence.description:
Joule offers personalized assistance to task checklists, and stage-based guidance for new hires from pre–Day 1, ensuring they feel confident, informed, and connected from the start. Key Demo Features - 1. Enable Task Completion: Joule enables HR managers to effortlessly view and complete tasks without the hassle of navigating through multiple pages.
2. Assist New Hires: Acting as a personal onboarding assistant, Joule offers new hires tailored information from Day 1 requirements to whom they should meet to what documents to bring—Joule’s got them covered!

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Empower Your Business with Intelligent Situation Handling
sessionsBySequence.description: Situation Handling in SAP S/4HANA Cloud automatically notifies the responsible users about critical issues that require their attention, such as upcoming deadlines, expiring contracts, and many more. Learn more about the different configuration options, analytics capabilities, and how we're moving towards enhanced intelligence in the situation resolution process.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Optimizing Budget Allocation with Joule Capability
sessionsBySequence.description:
A Cost Center Manager needs to ensure that the planned expenditures for their cost Center remain within the allocated budget.
The manager identifies that the planned spend will exceed the remaining budget in one or more budget. 
categories, requiring immediate corrective actions to prevent overspending.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Cloud ALM -  One stop solution for Implementation, Operations, and Transformation
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Cloud ALM is an application lifecycle management platform tailor-made for cloud-centric customers, manages cloud and hybrid solutions and is planned to support every SAP solution. It ensures accelerated implementation and smooth operations of your end-to-end business solution throughout the entire lifecycle. SAP Cloud ALM helps you to implement and operate intelligent cloud and hybrid business solutions. Customers benefit from an out-of-the-box, native cloud solution, designed as the central entry point to manage your SAP landscape with content-driven guided implementation and highly automated operations.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Extend, Automate, Digitalize business processes with SAP Build
sessionsBySequence.description: Learn about SAP Build and upcoming capabilities of SAP Build

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Unlocking the Future of Planning and Analytics with Generative AI in SAP Analytics Cloud
sessionsBySequence.description: Discover how SAP is revolutionizing planning and analytics by integrating the transformative power of generative AI. This session will provide an immersive experience into the latest innovations within SAP Analytics Cloud, showcasing how generative AI capabilities are enabling smarter decision-making, streamlined planning processes, and deeper data-driven insights. Learn how these advancements empower businesses to stay ahead in a dynamic world, leveraging AI to enhance productivity, accuracy, and creativity in analytics. Join us to explore the possibilities of a future shaped by intelligent technologies.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business AI Features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
sessionsBySequence.description: Preview of exciting AI innovations planned with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, specifically for GROW with SAP customers and partners. Session will cover enhancements powered by artificial intelligence: user experience optimization through smart summarization and intuitive filtering, and advanced financial business insights for more informed decision-making. These features aim to provide users with critical business insights, enabling them to optimize their operations and work more efficiently. This session will offer insightful demonstrations of each feature, showcasing how AI can transform everyday business processes in the cloud environment.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Joule Integration with Revenue Accounting and Reporting
sessionsBySequence.description: The integration of Joule, With revenue accounting and reporting aims to streamline operational efficiencies and enhance financial transparency within organizations . Joule leverages cutting-edge technology to monitor and optimize revenue by ensuring accurate and real-time data collection.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Fusion Development with ABAP Cloud and SAP Build
sessionsBySequence.description: Demo of a business scenario realized through key user extensibility + On-stack developer extensibility + side-by-side extensibility leveraging ABAP Cloud, SAP Build Process Automation and SAP Build Workzone. The demo showcases the power of fusion development with a message - It is not Build or ABAP. It could be both and that is a powerful combination!

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: AI-driven Integration: Transforming business connectivity with SAP Integration Suite
sessionsBySequence.description: Join this session to discover how SAP Integration Suite brings Business AI to reality. From Narrow AI to Generative AI, see how seamlessly embedded AI innovations elevate your integration capabilities and unlock smarter, faster business outcomes.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP SuccessFactors: Personalized Career Recommendations Based on Your Unique Skills
sessionsBySequence.description:
🚀 *Revolutionizing Recruitment: Join Us to Experience the Future of Job Matching!* 🚀

🔍 *Are you tired of the traditional job search grind, struggling to find opportunities that truly match your unique skills and experiences?*

🎯 *Imagine a personalized job search experience, where your resume unlocks doors to perfect career opportunities. That future is here!*

🌟 *Introducing our game-changing Resume Skills Matching solution:*
- 🔑 Effortlessly find and apply to jobs tailored to your skills
- 🎯 Increase your chances of landing your dream job
- 💻 Seamless integration into your job search process
- 🔒 Strict adherence to privacy regulations and secure data handling

🌍 *Whether you're a job seeker aiming to streamline your search or an employer eager to attract qualified candidates, this innovation is a must-see!*

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Joule – upcoming innovations
sessionsBySequence.description: Joule – upcoming innovations

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Model Enterprise Responsibilities for a Business User in S/4HANA Using Responsibility Management
sessionsBySequence.description: Come learn and experience how SAP Responsibility Management in S/4HANA is now helping business area to model enterprise responsibilities for a business user easily.With it’s strong Query APIs and easy modelling of data , the RM become the central place for responsibility modelling as the need of managing responsibilities for a business user  in Cloud and On Premise.

handson.sessiontitle: GenAI Hub based Ai Application development
handson.description: Deepen your knowledge of prompt engineering and refine your skills in crafting highly effective prompts for AI models. Prompt engineering is crucial in steering AI models toward producing desired outputs by guiding their responses in a targeted direction. Through these exercises, you will gain valuable insights into deploying an LLM model and learn how to harness its capabilities to execute a variety of queries with precision and accuracy.

The Terraform provider for SAP BTP allows the management of resources on the SAP Business Technology Platform via Terraform.
 
 You will find the detailed information about the provider in the official documentation in the Terraform registry.
 
 You find usage examples in the examples folder of this repository.

handson.sessiontitle: Integrate CAP NodejS Application in SAP Build Process Automation
handson.description: The goal is to cover all the necessary steps to consume the CAP Service API functions in a Process, not to provide a real use case. With Action concept, it simplifies the experience for Citizen Developers to consume APIs without coding (no-code).

SAP Build Code is an application development environment for Java and JavaScript. The turnkey solution combines runtime and design time capabilities with built-in enterprise solution integrations, DevOps, and Application Lifecycle Management. Joule, the AI copilot that understands your business, is available to assist with code generation.

handson.sessiontitle: SAP HANA Cloud with Vector Engine and GenAI Hub
handson.description: In this use case, we will embark on a journey to explore the capabilities of SAP HANA Cloud vector engine, SAP Generative AI Hub and the Python Langchain Framework. The goal is to equip you with the knowledge and skills to handle unstructured and semi-structured data and build efficient applications.

Hands On about building a CAP plugin with NodeJS.The idea is to create a plugin once and use it many times, hence to reduce the total effort of development and operations, so CAP application developers can focus on their domain

handson.sessiontitle: Unleashing Potential: Hands-On Session with Joule, the UI for AI
handson.description: Deepen your understanding of activating Joule with SAP products. Learn about key prerequisites including SAP Cloud Identity Services and SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), and explore the Joule activation process.
